column4: I am using latest ubuntu (24 days old; updating now). I was watching a video (VLC) from my external hard disk (not backed up by a UPS). during a power cut, VLC crashed, and from then on I couldn't play any sound. is this happened to anyone here.
no but I uninstalled gdm and sound stopped working
tried checking your synaptic history for that day? any weird dmesg output now?
